#summary Download release builds on osmdroid.

= Introduction =

This page lists the downloads available for osmdroid.


= Maven =

If you use Maven then you can include osmdroid in your project by referencing the following dependency

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.osmdroid</groupId>
  <artifactId>osmdroid-android</artifactId>
  <version>4.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

and also optionally

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.osmdroid</groupId>
  <artifactId>osmdroid-third-party</artifactId>
  <version>4.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

= Otherwise =

If you're not using Maven then you can download the files directly from
[https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/ Maven Central]

  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-android/4.0/osmdroid-android-4.0.jar osmdroid-android-4.0.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-android/4.0/osmdroid-android-4.0-sources.jar osmdroid-android-4.0-sources.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-android/4.0/osmdroid-android-4.0-javadoc.jar osmdroid-android-4.0-javadoc.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-third-party/4.0/osmdroid-third-party-4.0.jar osmdroid-third-party-4.0.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-third-party/4.0/osmdroid-third-party-4.0-sources.jar osmdroid-third-party-4.0-sources.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-third-party/4.0/osmdroid-third-party-4.0-javadoc.jar osmdroid-third-party-4.0-javadoc.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-packager/4.0/osmdroid-packager-4.0.jar osmdroid-packager-4.0.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-packager/4.0/osmdroid-packager-4.0-sources.jar osmdroid-packager-4.0-sources.jar]
  * [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/org/osmdroid/osmdroid-packager/4.0/osmdroid-packager-4.0-javadoc.jar osmdroid-packager-4.0-javadoc.jar]
